sentences.sentence: Objective: To study the role of endothelin-1 (ET -1) and PGI2 in cerebral infarction.
sentences.translation: 目的：探讨内皮素—1 (ET—1)和前列环素(PGI_2)在脑梗塞发病中的作用。

sentences.sentence: Plasma endothelin contents before treatment and after treatment of 15 days were determined.
sentences.translation: 分别于首次治疗前及15天以后取血，测定血浆内皮素。

sentences.sentence: Endothelial dysfunction can be measured by the increased levels of a set of biomarkers, such as serum endothelin-1, E-Selectin and MMP-9.
sentences.translation: 血管内皮功能障碍可以通过一系列生物标志物：血清内皮素- 1,e -选择素和mmp—9水平的提高来评估。
